tasks.name: Identify Ping Target
tasks.objective: Determine the specific target for the ping operation relevant to the repository.
actions: Consult with stakeholders to clarify the target for the ping operation.
Review repository documentation for potential targets.
acceptance: A clear target for the ping operation is documented.
risks: Misidentifying the target could lead to incorrect results.
mitigations: Validate the target with multiple stakeholders before proceeding.

tasks.name: Define Report Requirements
tasks.objective: Establish the format and details required for the repository report.
actions: Gather requirements from users regarding the report format and content.
Analyze existing reports for structure and detail.
acceptance: Report requirements are documented and approved by stakeholders.
risks: Insufficient report details may not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on report requirements based on user feedback.

tasks.name: Plan Ping and Report Execution
tasks.objective: Create a plan for executing the ping operation and generating the report based on identified target and requirements.
actions: Draft a step-by-step execution plan for the ping operation.
Outline the process for compiling the report based on ping results.
acceptance: Execution plan is documented and ready for implementation.
risks: Execution plan may not align with user expectations.
mitigations: Review the execution plan with stakeholders for alignment.

notes: This iteration focuses on clarifying ambiguities regarding the ping target and report requirements before proceeding with implementation.
